entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 01:05 AM MDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon then periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 01:05 AM MDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then partly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 01:05 AM MDT Monday 13 March 2023
